channel.title: If player turns into npc using ::pnpc### does npc anims
channel.description: how would i go about this. what i want to happen is if a player or me does ::pnpc #### they will not only become that npc but have that npc's anims when attacking/walking. ive noticed walking is usually fine but when i go to attack its very glitching because i guess its making them do regular player anims. any solutions?

item.title: If player turns into npc using ::pnpc### does npc anims
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

getWalkAnim,getStandAnim, and others was for 317 :o idk about yours,

if (npcID != -1) { switch (npcID) { case #id#: (walkEmote) = requiredID; return; }

Read full topic
item.source: If player turns into npc using ::pnpc### does npc anims

item.title: If player turns into npc using ::pnpc### does npc anims
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:519177”]In your pnpc command add something like this under the if(newNPC <= 20000) shit:

if(newNPC == ###){ //Do the anims and shit here } [/quote]

nvm it was in combatassistant.java i got it now thankyou for trying to help though

Read full topic
item.source: If player turns into npc using ::pnpc### does npc anims

item.title: If player turns into npc using ::pnpc### does npc anims
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

In your pnpc command add something like this under the if(newNPC <= 20000) shit:

if(newNPC == ###){
//Do the anims and shit here
}

Read full topic
